title: Deepening Learning of Rational Numbers and Fractions through Adaptive Digital Tutoring

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining digital tools and offline activities for university students requiring foundational numeracy enhancement

learning_goals: Learners can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division of rational numbers with ≥85% accuracy using virtual manipulatives
Learners can explain the process of solving real-world problems by applying conversions between fractions and decimals
Learners can analyze their error patterns and develop improvement strategies based on feedback from adaptive digital tutors
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
